articles.title: Ethereum is Maturing: Grayscale Says ETH is Becoming an Asset Class - U.Today
articles.description: Ethereum is maturing as Grayscale says ETH is turning into an asset class with a new group of investors prioritizing it
articles.content:
Ethereum is no longer a niche asset and cryptos coder darling. Speaking to Bloomberg, Grayscales managing director Michael Sonnenshein said it is evolving into an asset class.

articles.title: The current R rate in Wales as new coronavirus rules start - Wales Online
articles.description: New measures were introduced in Wales which means pubs, restaurants and bars have to close a 6pm and can't sell alcohol
articles.content:
The R rate for Wales remains higher than that of England according to the latest figures.
